title: Achacho Punnagai Song Lyrics Shahjahan
stanzas:
Achacho Punnagai Song Lyrics Shahjahan
#ManiSharma #UdiNarayan #Vairamuthu

achacho punnagai
aal thinnum punnagai
kai kuttaiyil
naan pidithu
kayyodu maraithukonden

achacho punnagai
aththipoo punnagai
sindhaamal sidharaamal
mundhaanai yendhi konden

un punnagai
enum saaviyaal
un punnagai
enum saaviyaal
en kadhal thirandhu konden

achacho punnagai
aal thinnum punnagai
kai kuttaiyil
naan pidithu
kayyodu maraithukonden

varthayil kadhalai
sonnaai en
vaaliban nenainthadhadi

unai kalandhapin
nan sendru kulithaal
kadal kudi neer aagumadi

kavidhai idhu kavidhai
innum karpanai
seivomaa

uyirai idam maattri
nam udhadugal serpomaa

ammammaa nuni viral thotte
en idhayam padhariyadhe
aazhangal thoda ennaagum
en uyire sidhariyadhe

nee theendinaal
uyir thoondinaal
nenjil pokraan vedikiradhe

achacho punnagai
aal thinnum punnagai
kai kuttaiyil
naan pidithu
kayyodu maraithukonden

pennukkul ithanai
sugama andha brahmanin
karam vazhga

enakkul thoongiya
sugathai indru
ezhuppiya viral vazhga

adiye suga vagaiye
innum aayiram kodiyadi
kaiyile konjam valaindhaal
en karpanai neelumadi

vetkathai un muthaththaal
nee salavai seidhu vidu
pen dhegam oru pearadu
un peyarai ezhudhividu

iru udhadugal
en ezhudhukoal
vaa anbe valaindhukodu

achacho punnagai
aal thinnum punnagai
kai kuttaiyil
naan pidithu
kayyodu maraithukonden

achacho punnagai
aththipoo punnagai
sindhaamal sidharaamal
mundhaanai yendhi konden

un punnagai
enum saaviyaal
un punnagai
enum saaviyaal
en kadhal thirandhu konden
